mapper.select: select qt.questioncode, qt.techcode, t.techname from tech t inner join questiontech qt on qt.techcode = t.code where qt.questionCode = #{code};
select count(*) from question where title like'%'#{search}'%' or content like '%'#{search}'%'
mapper.insert: insert into Question (title, Content, Writer, ReportDate) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{reportDate})
insert into answer (questionCode, writer, content, WriteDate) values (#{questionCode}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{date})
mapper.update: update Question set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reportDate = #{reportDate} where code = #{code}
